${ModID}:MasterSpark.NAME: Мастер-спарк
${ModID}:MasterSpark.DESCRIPTION: Наносит !D! урона. ${ModID}:Усиление [E] : NL Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:ShootingEcho.NAME: Shooting Echo
${ModID}:ShootingEcho.DESCRIPTION: Наносит !D! урона. Exhaust a random card to gain a copy of this. NL Сжигается.

${ModID}:StardustReverie.NAME: Stardust Reverie
${ModID}:StardustReverie.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the next card you play to gain !M! ${ModID}:Charge Up and draw 1 card.

${ModID}:UltimateShortwave.NAME: Ultimate Shortwave
${ModID}:UltimateShortwave.DESCRIPTION: Даёт !M! [E] и !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Заряда. NL ${ModID}:Усиление [E] : Increase both values by 1 this combat.

${ModID}:DragonMeteor.NAME: Dragon Meteor
${ModID}:DragonMeteor.DESCRIPTION: Наносит !D! урона. Deals !M! additional damage for each card in your exhaust pile.

${ModID}:EarthlightRay.NAME: Earthlight Ray
${ModID}:EarthlightRay.DESCRIPTION: After you gain ${ModID}:Charge Up, deal damage equal to !M! times its total to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Spark.NAME: Искра
${ModID}:Spark.DESCRIPTION: Наносит !D! урона. ${ModID}:Усиление [E] : NL Даёт !M! ${ModID}:Заряда. NL Сжигается.
